org.jhove2.module.assess
Class AssessmentResultSet

java.lang.Object
  org.jhove2.core.reportable.AbstractReportable
      org.jhove2.module.assess.AssessmentResultSet
All Implemented Interfaces:
Reportable
@Persistent
public class AssessmentResultSet
extends AbstractReportable

An AssessmentResultSet contains references to the object being assessed and the RuleSet being applied. It evaluates each Rule in the RuleSet and stores the the assessment outcome for that Rule in a list of AssessmentResult objects.

Field Summary
protected  List<AssessmentResult> assessmentResults
          The list of outcomes for each assessment rule in the RuleSet.
protected  Validator.Validity booleanResult
          The boolean result of the RuleSet's evaluation of the object.
protected  String narrativeResult
          The rule's consequent or alternative text, depending on the value of booleanResult
protected  RuleSet ruleSet
          The Set of Rule(s) to be applied against the #assessedObject.

fireAllRules

public void fireAllRules(Object assessedObject)
For each Rule in the ruleSet, evaluate the rule against the #assessedObject and store the results in a AssessmentResult member of the assessmentResults. The outcome includes a boolean evaluation of the Rule's conditional expression, and a textual statement based on the true or false value of the evaluation.

Parameters:
assessedObject - Object (Source or Module) to be assessed
Throws:
JHOVE2Exception
